template.name: demo_test_tamp
template.value:
def test_run(data): data["username"] = "自动生成 字符串 2 字母数字 xuep1" data["pwd"] = "自动生成 字符串 4 字母数字 xuep1" feature = "user" # 功能 story = '/signup' # 故事 title = None # 标题 method = POST url = "/signup" # 接口地址 headers = {"token": "${token}"} # 请求头 params = None # get请求数据 data1 = None # post请求键值对数据 # post请求json数据，注意数据格式为字典或者为json串 为空写None json_data = ''' { "phone": "自动生成 手机号", "pwd": "${pwd}", "rePwd": "${pwd}", "userName": "${username}" } ''' files = None # post请求，上传文件 status_code = 200 # 响应状态码 expect = "2000" # 预期结果 # json path，参数类型为列表 根据jsonpath提取响应正文中的数据 json_path = [{"token": '$.data.token'}] # --------------------分界线，下边的不要修改----------------------------------------- json_data1 = None if (isinstance(json_data, str)): json_data1 = json.loads(json_data)
d = { "method": method, "url": url, "data": data1, "params": params, "json": json_data1, "status_code": status_code, "expect": expect, "headers": headers, "json_path": json_path, "feature": feature, "story": story, "title": title, "files": files } request_tamp(d,data)
